item.title: Database - Logical Design
item.description: Table Of Contents Logical Modelling? Logical Modelling After the conceptual design, the next phase is to create functional relational schemas based on the conceptual design. A written description of how the relational database will be implemented. This includes deciding which CK(s) will become the PK.
